New Records: Quinton de Kock scored 174 off 140 balls, his 20th ODI century
Shakib Al Hasan returned to the Bangladesh team for the match
Key Match Events: Bangladesh were dismissed for 233 runs in 46.4 overs
Quinton de Kock and Heinrich Klaasen scored centuries
Key dismissals including Litton Das and Rassie van der Dussen
Pre-Game Insights: Shakib Al Hasan was fit and returned to the team
South Africa opted to bat first due to the heat
Bangladesh's batting and bowling struggles were highlighted
Post-Match Reflections: Quinton de Kock praised the team's performance
Shakib Al Hasan expressed disappointment but remained positive
Bangladesh's campaign was on the brink
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match was played on a hot and humid day
South Africa's batting strength was evident
Bangladesh's fielding and death bowling were criticized
Others: The match was a significant one for Quinton de Kock's career
South Africa's dominance was a topic of discussion
